channel.title: Questions concerning my minigame
channel.description:
So I'm kind of ripping the name 'Rise of the Six' from Jagex, but I'm making a new barrows minigame where the Strange-Old Man teleports you to the barrows arena(Basically the barrows hills on height 12 :p) and then they would then begin spawning after a couple of seconds, and continue respawning. my questions are as follows: 1. How would I setup the npc's spawning (Several of each brother) or one spawns, and shortly after another spawns until a limit is hit?
2. How would I set up a type of lobby with a 10-15 second waiting period before the spawn?
3. Last but not least, how would I make it so [I]only[/I] the brothers being spawned in this region can drop barrows items? where as the ones in their graves do not.
4. How would I make it so each brother spawns on their corresponding hill?
Help would be appreciated! If you could help me make this ( Not spoonfeeding) just giving me tips, and explaining some of the things for me. That would be great, just let me know.

item.title: Questions concerning my minigame
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

1: loops.
2: depending on whether or not your server has an event manager or some time-cycling system, you can use this, or define your own loop with the currentTimeMillis()
3: remove all drop data from the npcs where the data is stored in the local files, and hard-code it. check the npc death and only spawn ground items if the npc + player height is 12.
4: when spawning, just define the coordinates you want each npc to spawn at. most npc spawning methods require arguments for the coordinates to be passed to it.
